content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursebiancadl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]


-- Using abfss protocol
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi@synapsecoursebiancadl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'


-- Changing Data Types
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursebiancadl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
WITH(
    LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)
)AS [result]


-- Specify Collation
CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery

USE nyc_taxi_discovery

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8

SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases


-- Renaming Columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursebiancadl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) 
WITH(
    location_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)AS [result]


-- Subset of Columns in Headerless File
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursebiancadl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) 
WITH(
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) 2
)AS [result]


-- Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi@synapsecoursebiancadl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
)

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) 
WITH(
    location_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)AS [result]

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi

SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources
